name: es9018k2m
description: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C with automatic volume synchronization
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C. Automatic volume synchronization with Volumio, digital filters (FIR/IIR), DPLL jitter reduction, and balance control. Works with any ES9018K2M-based DAC HAT using the standard i2s-dac overlay.
volumio_info.changelog: v1.1.0 - Simplified architecture: removed overlay management, added optimal init registers from ES9038Q2M, hardware soft-start for pop-free playback
